entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 8.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 118.00

应用描述

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 8.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 118.00

应用描述

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Yōkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 88.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 22.00

应用描述

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

entry.title: VAKA No: 1937
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • 150 Kredi：HK$ 48.00 → HK$ 22.00 [HK$ 22.00 ~ HK$ 48.00]
  • 75 Credits：HK$ 22.00 → HK$ 18.00 [HK$ 18.00 ~ HK$ 22.00]

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 8.00

App 內購買項目

  • 150 Kredi：HK$ 22.00
  • Early Access：HK$ 8.00
  • Weekly Pass：HK$ 18.00
  • 75 Credits：HK$ 18.00
  • 30 Credits：HK$ 18.00
  • 10 Credits：HK$ 8.00

应用描述

Sisli sokaklar, karanlık sırlar ve her köşede gizlenmiş bir hikâye. Vaka No: 1937, sizi geçmişin büyülü ve tehlikeli atmosferine götüren seçim tabanlı bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Bu interaktif deneyimde, usta dedektif Refik Bey’in yerine geçiyor, İstanbul’un dört bir yanında çözülememiş vakaların peşine düşüyorsunuz. Her karar, olayların gidişatını değiştiriyor. Kimi zaman bir şüpheliyle yapacağınız konuşma, kimi zaman basit bir delil, sizi bambaşka bir sona götürebilir. Aynı hikâyeyi farklı yollarla yeniden oynayabilir, gizli sonları ve olay örgüsündeki farklı dallanmaları keşfederek İstanbul'un karanlık geçmişine ışık tutabilirsiniz. İlk vakanı çözmeye hazır mısın?

entry.title: myLightMeter PRO
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 38.00 → HK$ 32.00 [HK$ 32.00 ~ HK$ 38.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 32.00

应用描述

Designed by a photographer for photographers, focused on RELIABILITY and PRECISION for digital and analog photography. • Extended sensitivity as low as -2/-4EV (dark scenes) • Two different convenient interface designs. • Incident and reflected light metering modes. • Save exposure data. • f/Tools connection. • Independent calibration for the two metering modes. • Independent selection of aperture, speed, ISO and exposure compensation with 1/3 resolution. From 4 hours to 1/8000 sec., aperture from 1.0 to 512 and ISO from 0.8 to 6400. • Automatic priority for aperture or speed. (Automatic Av and Tv modes). • Automatic ISO or locked ISO options. • Point metering in camera view. • Maximum aperture limited by the selected lens. • Calculate the average of any number of measurements you want. • Read the exposure data of any photo from the gallery. • Calculate hyperfocal distance for 5 memorized lenses. Which also blocks maximum aperture. • Memory for 5 lenses with maximum aperture, focal length and film/sensor size for calculating hyperfocal distance and aperture. • Hyperfocal distance also for infrared light. (IR button) • Exposure value EV on an analog scale or right up front. • On 3.5 " displays preset lens buttons tilting the device or tapping at the bottom. • Be advised that accurate incident light reading needs a diffuser attached to the front camera. Without the diffuser still can be used but think about it, it will be a reflected reading taken with the front camera. I'm an independent photographer/designer/developer and am very grateful for your support. Trying to do the best lightmeter app ever, a lot more to come. You can ask for any improvement and I'll be happy to help. This app is constantly reviewed and improved because it is my tool, if you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact me by email at davidquiles@me.com Thank you! David Quiles

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: 地牢防禦 : 勇士的侵入
entry.id: 地牢防禦 : 勇士的侵入-hk-1751551965928
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 8.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 8.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • 功能禮包：HK$ 32.00
  • 自動禮包：HK$ 128.00
  • 綜合禮包：HK$ 128.00
  • 寶石300個：HK$ 32.00
  • 戒指禮包：HK$ 188.00
  • 寶石180個：HK$ 22.00
  • 魔法禮包：HK$ 68.00
  • 魅魔禮包：HK$ 328.00
  • 寶石660個：HK$ 68.00
  • 地獄禮包：HK$ 188.00

应用描述

GameCoaster你想一個有趣的遊戲，但小一開發商的第二個工作 ※ 最有可能引進 遊戲以治療入侵者到來猛攻成為保護地牢守護者！ 盲目地扔你有武器，它必須以免攻擊地牢。 級別和項目養殖，地牢重塑，從性能的保證，雅可怕的敵人當心！ ※ 故事 拉什是世界上所有的怪物，以期佔領這個世界的最後一個地牢， 勇敢和亨特，旨在保證這個怪物，放在幫助。 為了保護地牢入侵者，你可以拿出已經堆成了一座武器。 ※ 遊戲特色 ◈請盡量記住復古的圖形和聲音的懷舊回憶。 ◈容易玩，任何人都可以很容易地享受。 ◈高興地屠殺敵人即將到來喉嚨按丈夫！它給人以強烈的打擊感和愉悅。 ◈請盡量協同作用，並使用武器的不同！ ◈準時提供一個新的擔保實現的結果！ -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283 @ GameCoaster

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 22.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 22.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

三秒記一筆！快速、安全、好用是我們的宗旨，更有 iOS 通知中心的Widget插件。 看看其他人怎麼說： ◎ 我本身係個要求高的人，但這個真的不錯！ ◎ 加密功能结合Touch ID功能就Very good了。 ◎ 簡潔明瞭的介面 操作方便。 ◎ 不管是APP跟Widget都很好上手。 ◎ 分类多样细致明确，操作方便快速。 Apple Watch: 您可以在 Apple Watch 中增加收支資料。在 Glance 中檢視您今日和本月的開支情況。 特色功能： ◎ 三秒速記：向下拉、填金額、選分類 ◎ iOS 通知中心插件：iPhone鎖屏時也能輕鬆、快速地記賬 ◎ 密碼安全保護：除了您，任何人均無法開啟。即使雙擊Home鍵在App清單中也無法檢視資料 ◎ 支援 160 多種貨幣，更能自動更新換算匯率 ◎ 計算器：內建計算器，任何時候都無需先心算再輸入，她幫你輕鬆搞定 ◎ 全手勢操作：快速記賬的基礎 ◎ 人性化的新手引導：對於特別的操作，我們通過動畫 + 文字的方式引導，更直觀、更易懂 ◎ iCloud 備份和恢復 ◎ Dropbox 備份和恢復 ◎ 匯出資料至CSV ◎ 經常性事件，無論是開支和收入，具有豐富的頻率選項。 ◎ 允許自定義主題顏色和牆紙 ◎ 允許從收支模板生成新的收支記錄 基本功能： ◎ 收支記錄可以加入照片 ◎ 收入、支出、轉賬，該有的都有 ◎ 多種圖形報表，讓您輕鬆檢視年/月/周的收支情況 ◎ 預算管理：給自己控制消費一個理由 ◎ 多種顏色主題及牆紙，讓您充分個性化 ◎ 自定義收支類別和消費賬戶，更符合您的需要 ◎ 同時支援 iPhone 和 iPad ◎ 每日記賬提醒 增強功能： ◎ 通過手勢輕鬆複製歷史記錄，並自動將消費日期定位在當天，您只需要修改金額即可。當然，您也可以使用現有金額直接儲存 ◎ 帳單編輯時也可以新增收支類別和消費賬戶，更可以點選國旗更改當前消費的幣種 如果您因為擔心記賬麻煩而放棄記賬 如果您因為時間匆忙而放棄記賬 如果您想知道自己的花銷在何處 如果您想通過記賬來控制花銷，達到省錢的目的 如果。。。 試試我們的“天天記賬”吧，她會是您最佳的助理 URL Schemes: DayCost:// 有任何建議或意見，請給我們來信：support@daycost.com

entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 6.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 6.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 118.00

应用描述

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 2.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 788.00

应用描述

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Yōkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 88.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 88.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 22.00

应用描述

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

entry.title: This Is the Police
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 55.00 → HK$ 12.00 [HK$ 12.00 ~ HK$ 55.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 12.00

应用描述

《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？ - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！ - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。 - 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

应用描述

延續「1941 Frozen Front」的戰鬥，惟這一次，打的是海戰。加入海軍，打贏生死存亡之戰！稱雄戰場，派遣戰士奔赴前線。最真實的軍事作戰！ 選擇正確戰術，運用突擊隊，擊潰頑敵！既可以在戰役中指揮美軍，也可以在戰鬥中統領日軍。步兵、炮兵、坦克、飛機、戰艦、潛艇，多兵種協同作戰，消滅敵軍幫兇；PACIFIC FRONT，以靈活的指揮技巧獲得晉升！ *** 任務簡報 *** 魚雷、炸彈，強大武器上陣作戰！ 坦克、步兵，攻克敵人陣地！ 轟炸機群，搗毀敵軍指揮部！ 潛艇偷襲，令敵軍防不勝防！ 在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！ 清除灘頭、湖泊、海峽的各種障礙！ 伏擊敵人！ 為部隊提供物資和彈藥！ 護衛航母及戰艦群！ 特色： - 去除廣告！ - 以二戰為背景的回合制戰略行動遊戲 - 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務 - 符合史實的美、日軍隊建制 - 美日雙方步兵、炮兵、坦克、飛機、戰艦、潛艇，多兵種一應俱全 - 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物 -白熱化的多人戰鬥 - 六角網格可一覽無餘 - 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效 - 高難的搖滾配樂 感謝您選擇 '1942 Pacific Front'！

  • Root: The Marauder Expansion：HK$ 88.00

应用描述

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

应用描述

**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running** 97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we’ll give you your test fee back if you fail. Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we’ve helped prepare for their driving theory test. Suitable for: • Car Drivers in GB & NI • Motorcyclists in GB & NI • Trainee ADI's in GB & NI • HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025 Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions! Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test. Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you’re ready to sit the official Theory Test! FREE PASS GUARANTEE We’re so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your £23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C’s apply**. LEARNER PLAN Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish. LEADERBOARD Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions. SMART AI MODE Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support. VOICEOVER English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia. HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST 85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test. THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover. ROAD SIGNS 2025 Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions. Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT Includes: • 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test • The top 10 reasons for failing • Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety • A full mock driving test with examiner debrief • All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT Access to exclusive offers and discounts! AWARDS: • Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018 • As featured on the Gadget Show • Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024 • App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019 • Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App • DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year" CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Requires account creation to access content. *Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full **Pass Guarantee T&C’s apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

entry.title: Ableton Note
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 68.00 → HK$ 38.00 [HK$ 38.00 ~ HK$ 68.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 38.00

应用描述

Start new musical ideas with a curated selection of sounds and effects. Create beats and melodic parts, sample your world, and continue your tracks in Ableton Live. Note is a place to form ideas, explore new sounds and find direction. Get your ideas out or just experiment until inspiration hits, using a selection of Ableton Live’s drum kits, synths and melodic instruments. Create your own sound palette by sampling with your phone’s built-in microphone. And use Note’s built-in MIDI Editor to sequence notes, beats and chords or make tweaks as you listen back Follow your ideas wherever they lead by sending your projects to Live without leaving the app with the help of Ableton Cloud. Open projects from Live’s browser and keep working – you can edit all your MIDI notes, and all your samples and sounds from Note are exactly the same. Ableton Note users get a free license for Ableton Live Lite – simple, intuitive software used by musicians, producers and DJs around the world to write, record, and perform. For Ableton Move users, Note also offers the chance to keep working on a Set from your phone. Begin with a beat: • Choose from 76 Drum Sampler kits • Tap out a beat using the 16-pad grid, or sequence one with the MIDI Editor • Play each drum hit melodically using 16 Pitches mode • Quantize your beat or nudge notes to fix loose timing or mistakes • Add more layers of rhythm • Create beat repetitions with Note Repeat • Change parameters to shape your sound • Experiment with effects or apply swing for variations Start with a melody: • Choose from 317 synth sounds and 60 Melodic Sampler instruments • Play or program your melody or chord progression with the 25-pad grid, piano roll or MIDI Editor • Set a key and scale to get instantly harmonic results • Add more layers of harmony • Change parameters to shape your sound • Add effects to experiment with sound design Sample your environment: • Create your own kits by recording percussive sounds into Note’s Drum Sampler • Record tonal sounds to create your own Melodic Sampler instruments • Manipulate your samples by cutting, filtering or repitching them • Sequence samples into beats, melodies and chords using the MIDI Editor • Shape or transform your sounds with effects • Import your own samples or audio directly from videos Capture improvisations: • Play something, then tap the Capture button to keep it • Play at a tempo that feels comfortable and Note will detect it • Note will recognize the length of the phrase and create a loop • Quantize it, add to it, or change the sound • Connect MIDI hardware to play keys and change the sound of your instruments Create variations: • Note features a grid-based Session View layout • Double your loops to create variation within clips • Duplicate your clips and create different versions of your ideas • Add, delete or adjust multiple notes at once with the MIDI Editor • Create eight tracks with up to eight clips on eight scenes • Try different clip combinations and song structures • Export your work as an audio file to listen and share

entry.title: Driving Zone: Germany Pro
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 12.00 → HK$ 2.00 [HK$ 2.00 ~ HK$ 12.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 2.00

App 內購買項目

  • 20,000 coins：HK$ 2.00
  • 220,000 coins：HK$ 32.00
  • 90,000 coins：HK$ 18.00
  • 3,000,000 coins：HK$ 368.00
  • 2,000,000 coins：HK$ 228.00
  • 550,000 coins：HK$ 88.00
  • 1,300,000 coins：HK$ 188.00

应用描述

Driving Zone: Germany Pro - car game and street racing simulator without ads and limits. Drive with realistic physics and legendary german cars. In this game are presented cars prototypes of the German manufacturers: from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and luxury cars. Each car in the game has it's own technical specifications and engine sounds. Well detailed body and dashboard create the effect of full presence and realism. The game offers four unique tracks with different weather conditions. You can drive on high-speed highway, or go for a ride in the German town, which is particularly beautiful at night. If you are a real extreme racer, you should drive on winter track with dangerous icy road. You can choose the starting time of the day, that will change dynamically. You can also try driving on special race or drift track. Start the engine, press down on the gas and chase as quickly as possible. Earn points by overtaking traffic cars. Or go to the race track and try to pass it by shortest time for take maximum reward. Another mode is drift, where you can test your skills of drifting and earn points by fast and sharp skid angles. You will need points to open the new vehicles, modes and other features of the game. This racing simulator gives you the ability to choose the style of driving that can be quiet and safe or extremely dangerous racing. The abundance of settings allows you to customize a level of car physics realism, from arcade and simulation levels to the most realistic, as in the difficult racing simulator in which you will need to show your driving skills. Features: - No ads. - Modern beautiful graphics; - Car tuning and customization feature; - Realistic car physics; - Change the time of day in real-time; - 4 levels for street racing, many configurations of racetracks and drift tracks with different weather conditions; - First person view / Interior view / Cinematic camera; - Automatic cloud synchronization of your game progress. Warning! This game is quite realistic, but it is not designed to teach you how to street racing. Be careful and responsible when you're driving real car. Enjoy virtual driving in heavy car traffic, but please observe the traffic rules and be careful on real roads.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

  • GAIA Star Database：HK$ 0.00
  • SkySafari Premium Monthly：HK$ 33.00
  • Apollo Lunar Missions：HK$ 0.00

应用描述

SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009. Here's what’s new in version 7: + Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience. + Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions. + Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device. + Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari. Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer. These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices. SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people. OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time. This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object. SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts. + Sky Tonight - jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight. Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects. + Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations. New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data. + Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips. The Small Touches: + You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings. + Better Moon Age calculation. + New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines. + Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free - this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy. + Many more. If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it: + Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more! + Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events. + Control your telescope, log and plan your observations. + Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com. + Augmented Reality (AR) mode + Night Vision. + Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system. + Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way! https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Stop&Get Away From Me! Defense
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 2.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 788.00

应用描述

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Yōkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 6.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 6.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 22.00

应用描述

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.
